Text: Fucking YES! I've been constantly checking the internets for this one. THANK YOU!

This won't download on Linux.  Transmission gives a "Filename too long" error.  A bit of research (Googling 'transmission filename too long'") shows this is a Linux-wide problem.  Could someone who has DL'd already reseed with a shorter filename please, maybe not repeating the full name of the main file in the enclosing folder? Or moving credits and so on and placing in a text file within the folder?

Thanks anyway to the seeder.
